scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:js:dev && npm run copy
scripts.build:prod:test: npm run test && npm run clean && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:js:prod && npm run copy
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && npm run compile:sass && npm run compile:js:prod && npm run copy
scripts.test: npm run test_frontend && npm run test_backend
scripts.test_frontend: echo 'Frontend:' && eslint -c ./www/.eslintrc www/scripts/** && echo 'Passed! Now for the backend.'
scripts.test_backend: echo 'Backend:' && eslint -c ./lib/.eslintrc lib/** && echo 'Passed! We did it!'
